summary: Vikram Rathod, a policeman, joins with a small time thief Satthi Babu who looks identical to him to avenge his own destruction.
cast: Ravi Teja|Anushka Shetty|Annie|Brahmanandam|Vineet Kumar|Ajay|Ruthika|Ali|Raghu Babu|Devisri|Jyotika|Rajeev Kanakala|Vineeth Kumar|Meghna Naidu|Kausha Rach|Prakash Raj|Jayaprakash Reddy|Chandra Sekhar|Sivannarayana|Amit Tiwari
keywords: police|thief|look alike|dual role|stabbed in the back
title: Vikramarkudu
